total_sessions.label: Total Sessions
total_sessions.description: Total number of visits to the site in this period. One person can create multiple sessions if they return.

total_users.label: Total Users
total_users.description: Estimated number of unique people who visited the site in this period.

page_views.label: Page Views
page_views.description: Total times any page on the site was loaded or viewed, including repeat views.

engagement_rate.label: Engagement Rate
engagement_rate.description: Percent of sessions where visitors did something meaningful, such as viewing multiple pages, staying for a while, or triggering key events.

avg_session_duration.label: Avg. Session Duration
avg_session_duration.description: Average time visitors actively spent on the site during a visit.

bounce_rate.label: Bounce Rate
bounce_rate.description: Percent of sessions where visitors left after only one page with no meaningful interaction.

sessions_by_source.label: Sessions by Source
sessions_by_source.description: Shows how many visits came from each traffic source and medium combination, such as google / organic or BenchmarkEmail / email.

source_medium.label: Source / Medium
source_medium.description: Source is the specific origin, like google.com or BenchmarkEmail. Medium is the traffic type, such as organic search, referral, email, or direct.

direct_none.label: (direct) / (none)
direct_none.description: Visits where Analytics could not detect a referrer. Often people typing the URL, using bookmarks, or clicking untagged links in apps, PDFs, or emails.

google_organic.label: google / organic
google_organic.description: Unpaid clicks from Google search results.

bing_organic.label: bing / organic
bing_organic.description: Unpaid clicks from Bing search results.

duckduckgo_organic.label: duckduckgo / organic
duckduckgo_organic.description: Unpaid clicks from DuckDuckGo search results.

yahoo_referral.label: au.search.yahoo.com / referral
yahoo_referral.description: Clicks from Yahoo search results or pages that send traffic as referral.

benchmark_email_email.label: BenchmarkEmail / email
benchmark_email_email.description: Visits from links in Benchmark Email campaigns that have tracking tags.

email_signature_email.label: email / email-signature
email_signature_email.description: Visits from links in email signatures or ad‑hoc emails that are tagged as email traffic.

clickup_referral.label: app.clickup.com / referral
clickup_referral.description: Visitors coming from links inside ClickUp, such as shared tasks, docs, or dashboards.

instagram_referral.label: l.instagram.com / referral
instagram_referral.description: Clicks on links from Instagram that open in its in‑app browser, counted as referral traffic.

not_set_source.label: (not set)
not_set_source.description: Sessions where the traffic source information is missing or could not be determined.

top_pages_views.label: Views (Pages)
top_pages_views.description: How many times a specific page was viewed in the selected period.

top_pages_users.label: Users (Pages)
top_pages_users.description: How many unique visitors viewed this page at least once in the selected period.

top_products_views.label: Views (Products)
top_products_views.description: How many times a specific product page was viewed in the selected period.

top_products_users.label: Users (Products)
top_products_users.description: How many unique visitors viewed this product page at least once.

user_type_new.label: New Users
user_type_new.description: People visiting the site for the first time on this device or browser.

user_type_returning.label: Returning Users
user_type_returning.description: People who have visited before on this device or browser and came back in this period.

user_type_percentage.label: User Type Percentage
user_type_percentage.description: Share of total sessions that came from new vs returning visitors.

sessions_by_country.label: Sessions by Country
sessions_by_country.description: Where visits originated, based on IP location; some traffic may be ‘not set’ if location is unclear.

top_cities.label: Top Cities
top_cities.description: Cities that generated the most sessions in the selected period.

device_category.label: Device Category
device_category.description: Type of device used for the visit, such as desktop, mobile, or tablet.

desktop.label: desktop
desktop.description: Sessions from laptop or desktop computers.

event_name.label: Event Name
event_name.description: A specific action that was tracked on the site, such as viewing a page, scrolling, or submitting a form.

event_count.label: Event Count
event_count.description: Total number of times this event was recorded in the selected period.

event_page_view.label: page_view
event_page_view.description: Recorded whenever a page on the site loads or is viewed.

event_user_engagement.label: user_engagement
event_user_engagement.description: Recorded when a visitor has an engaged session, for example staying on a page long enough or interacting before leaving.

event_session_start.label: session_start
event_session_start.description: Recorded when a new visit to the site begins.

event_first_visit.label: first_visit
event_first_visit.description: Recorded the first time a device or browser ever visits the site.

event_scroll.label: scroll
event_scroll.description: Recorded when a visitor scrolls far enough down a page to show they viewed more than just the top.

event_form_start.label: form_start
event_form_start.description: Recorded when someone begins filling out a tracked form.

event_form_submit.label: form_submit
event_form_submit.description: Recorded when someone successfully submits a tracked form.

event_click.label: click
event_click.description: Recorded when a tracked button or link is clicked.

event_file_download.label: file_download
event_file_download.description: Recorded when a visitor downloads a tracked file, such as a PDF or brochure.

event_click_buy_online.label: click_buy_online
event_click_buy_online.description: Recorded when a visitor clicks a tracked ‘buy online’ or similar outbound purchase link.

event_click_buy_online: gbp_search_views\:{\label\:\Search Views\,\description\:\Number of times your business appeared in Google Search results.\},\gbp_maps_views\:{\label\:\Maps Views\,\description\:\Number of times your business appeared on Google Maps.\},\gbp_website_clicks\:{\label\:\Website Clicks\,\description\:\Number of clicks to your website from your Google Business Profile.\},\gbp_direction_requests\:{\label\:\Direction Requests\,\description\:\Number of requests for driving directions to your business location.\}}
